description.value: If Graz'zt hits with an attack against a target granting combat advantage to him, the target takes 25 extra damage. A creature dominated by Graz'zt counts as his ally for the purpose of flanking.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ acid, teleportation, weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+37 vs. AC

Hit: 4d10 + 27 damage (or 6d10 + 67 damage if Graz'zt scores a critical hit), and ongoing 20 acid damage (save ends). Graz'zt can then teleport to a square adjacent to the target.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Graz'zt uses Wave of Sorrow twice.

Recharge when no enemy is dominated by Graz'zt ✦ charm

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one or two creatures)

+35 vs. Will

Hit: The target is dominated (save ends; the target takes a -4 penalty to the saving throw). Graz'zt can force the dominated target to use encounter attack powers.

Aftereffect: The target takes a -4 penalty to Will until the end of the encounter.

system.rechargeCondition: when no enemy is dominated by Graz'zt

description.value:
Recharge 5-6 ✦ acid, teleportation, weapon

Standard

Effect: Close burst 2 (enemies in the burst); Graz'zt uses Wave of Sorrow once against each target.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Attack: Area burst 5 within 10 (enemies in the burst)

+35 vs. Reflex

Hit: 5d12 + 27 damage, and the target is weakened until the end of Graz'zt's next turn.

At-Will ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Graz'zt can alter his physical form to appear as an attractive Medium humanoid of any race or gender.

3/Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: Graz'zt takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.

Effect (Free Action): Graz'zt gains resist 20 to the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter or until he uses variable resistance again.

Recharge when Graz'zt misses with a weapon attack ✦ weapon

Triggered

Trigger: Graz'zt hits a creature with a weapon attack.

Effect (Free Action): The creature takes 25 extra damage.

system.rechargeCondition: when Graz'zt misses with a weapon attack
